abstract: Standard & Poor’s cut the credit ratings of the three largest American home builders — Lennar, Pulte Homes and D. R. Horton — to junk yesterday as demand for new homes deteriorated.
snippet: Standard & Poor’s cut the credit ratings of the three largest American home builders — Lennar, Pulte Homes and D. R. Horton — to junk yesterday as demand for new homes deteriorated.
lead_paragraph: Standard & Poor’s cut the credit ratings of the three largest American home builders  Lennar, Pulte Homes and D. R. Horton  to junk yesterday as demand for new homes deteriorated.

headline.main: Credit Ratings Cut to Junk for Top 3 Home Builders
headline.print_headline: Credit Ratings Cut to Junk For Top 3 Home Builders
